alert.note: Alert for Allegany (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 3:35PM EST until November 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Allegany county. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
